title: Axe
description: An unbreakable and upgradable axe. Visit the blacksmith in the castle ruins to upgrade it. Will degrade to previous upgrade after about 100 hits until upgraded with it's respective boss soul.
location: Can be found the eastern shrine of Hope's Rise. (The Great Plateau Bomb Shrine).
